channel.title: How to remove all objects in my world?
channel.description: Hey what's up guys, Currently, I wan't to make a entire custom Rsps Map, so I want to start of with a completely blank map, does anyone know how i can remove all buildings, walls, objects without I have to do it 1 by 1? or does anyone know how i can just make green normal ground? would be appreciated :) Thanks! :) Goldencoin.

item.title: How to remove all objects in my world?
item.dc:creator: @GfServerMaker1 GfServerMaker1
item.description:
@GfServerMaker1 wrote:

alright im just going to post this since you didn’t ever add me on skype:

How to: Remove objects.

c.getPA().checkObjectSpawn(-1, 2561, 3312, 0, 10);//workbencth c.getPA().checkObjectSpawn(-1, 2562, 3308, 0, 10);//workbencth c.getPA().checkObjectSpawn(-1, 2563, 3308, 0, 10);//workbencth c.getPA().checkObjectSpawn(-1, 2561, 3308, 0, 10);//workbencth c.getPA().checkObjectSpawn(-1, 2561, 3309, 0, 10);//workbencth c.getPA().checkObjectSpawn(-1, 2561, 3310, 0, 10);//workbencth
The -1 before it, removes the item
NOTE: you need to make sure you use the correct object’s id, otherwise you may remove the wrong item.
-1 = removal ( 2562, 3308 ) = coords the other two numbers shouldn’t be an issue.
this is in objectmanager.java ( server sided, not client.)
if you have any questions, you may ask me via pm on moparscape

THANKS TO EXO-PK < ( i took this code from them ) * credits to exo-pk

Read full topic
